items.sentence: Tom wondered what Mary was going to ask him to do.
Tom and Mary don\'t know what they should do next.
I think it must\'ve been Tom who broke the window.
I think it\'s a little too cold to go on a picnic.
I think it\'s more dangerous than you think it is.
I can\'t do my job without an internet connection.
I can\'t imagine myself doing something like that.
You don\'t deserve the salary they\'re paying you.
Give me your phone number and I\'ll call you back.
I wonder why Tom didn\'t come to school yesterday.
